Post-Match Reflections: India captain Shubman Gill expressed disappointment with his dismissal and the team's batting effort, stating that he should have carried the bat through the first T20I against Zimbabwe.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zimbabwe beat an Indian team brimming with an array of Next-Gen stars by 13 runs in the first T20I match of the five-match series.
Others: India were recently crowned champions in the T20 World Cup albeit with a different set of players. Gill said the team could not execute its plans and were a bit under-par on the field despite bowling well to restrict the hosts to 115 for nine.
